About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself...

BIO

Hello, my name is Reinis. I'm a Technology loving person with good analytical skills and experience in tech industry over a variety of roles. most recently working as a BE engineer, using PHP I developed the backend behind a cloud-based insurance system. This involved designing, creating and maintaining new microservices, creating new APIs and integrating third party APIs while at the same time keeping up with best engineering practises and making sure my code was covered with tests as much as possible. This experience has helped me grow substantially, and now I'm looking to expand and share my knowledge elsewhere.

Work Experience

BE Software Engineer

- Design and develop microservices with DDD principles in mind
- Maintain, debug and extend existing platform functionality

- Tools used: PHP, Git, Homestead, Doctrine, Symphony, Laravel, Docker

Service Manager Canada
Evolution Gaming Canada, Vancouver

- ​Identifying and resolving all game irregularities due to dealer mistake, software issues or any other reason​
- Resolving player disputes related to the actions of the dealer or any other event that could have affected the integrity of the game​

- Manage ad-hoc situations which may occur on shift in appropriate manner to still be able to deliver all products
